title: Python List Comprehension
description: Example of list comprehension in Python
code:
# Traditional way
squares = []
for x in range(10):
    squares.append(x**2)

# Using list comprehension
squares = [x**2 for x in range(10)]

# With condition
even_squares = [x**2 for x in range(10) if x % 2 == 0]
